resources.string: \ [Ktlint](https://pinterest.github.io/ktlint/) is used as the linter for this project.\ ## Ktlint Integration\ [Ktlint Gradle](https://github.com/JLLeitschuh/ktlint-gradle) is used to integrate ktlint into the project.\ ## Jetpack Compose Rules\ [Jetpack Compose Rules](https://mrmans0n.github.io/compose-rules/) is a set of custom ktlint rules designed to help prevent common pitfalls when working with composables. It is used to maintain a healthy Compose implementation.\ ## Configuration\ The `.editorconfig` file includes the following settings:\ ```ini\ [*.{kt,kts}]\ ktlint_code_style = android_studio\ ktlint_experimental = enabled\ ktlint_standard_class-signature = disabled\ ktlint_standard_function-signature = disabled\ ktlint_function_naming_ignore_when_annotated_with = Composable, Test\ ij_kotlin_allow_trailing_comma = true\ ij_kotlin_allow_trailing_comma_on_call_site = true\ ```
